title: Scientology opposes Right to Repair - this is where I call it quits...
description:
00:00 - Intro
00:12 - The DMCA isn't all bad
00:30 - Section 1201, on the other hand, is horrible
00:44 - What is section 1201?
01:12 - Example of section 1201 screwing over repair
02:08 - Example of section 1201 preventing technological progress
02:44 - Section 1201 needs to go, and I'm trying to make that happen
03:12 - Reading the scientology letter
06:15 - The takeaway from this video - manufacturer does NOT OWN THE DEVICE POST-SALE.
06:47 - An automotive analogy
07:14 - Back to the scientology letter
08:05 - Their asked edit makes this exemption useless since every manufacturer will include it in their EULA
10:17 - These people scare me....
